meanings.definition: The quality or state of being butch.
meanings.sent1: Her butchnesses shone through in her confident demeanor.
meanings.sent2: The group admired her butchnesses and respected her leadership.
meanings.sent3: Despite her butchnesses, she had a soft spot for kittens.
meanings.sent4: His butchnesses was like a shield, protecting those around him.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the butchnesses of the strong, silent type.

meanings.definition: The characteristics or traits associated with being butch.
meanings.sent1: The butchnesses of her appearance made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: He embraced his butchnesses and felt comfortable in his own skin.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected butchnesses of his fashion sense surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her butchnesses added a unique charm to her personality.
meanings.sent5: The butchnesses of the old cowboy could be felt in every step he took.
